Function Documentation

int wapi_get_ap ( int  sock,
const char *  ifname,
struct ether_addr *  ap 
)

Gets access point address of the device.

Parameters:
[out] ap Set the to MAC address of the device. (For "any", a broadcast ethernet address; for "off", a null ethernet address is used.)
